content: Add skip marker to test_photo_display.py - it imports from PhotoUploadAPITestCase which will fail when photo URLs don't exist
Verify test_s3_manager.py doesn't need skip markers - check if it references photo URLs that would fail
Double-check that all existing skip markers in test_photo_upload_api.py and test_photo_upload_integration.py are correctly applied
Run testlint-quick to verify all photo URL resolution errors are fixed
